welcomeDialogue:
So you've come to this island 
 to find the treasure?

I used to be a great wizard but now... 
 I'm a bit too old for taking an adventure
waterTip: If you become tired, rest at the water.

However, the monsters reappear if you rest. 
 I don't know why but that's how it works
In any case, don't push yourself too hard
keyTip: I wonder how to open that door

I have never been able to find the key to them,
 maybe you will succeed
